component.name: org.nuxeo.ecm.core.filename.FilenameService
component.documentation: Component defining the implementation to use to manage filenames.

extension-point.name: filenameService
extension-point.documentation:
Extension point defining the implementation for the management of filenames. Example:
The provided class must implement org.nuxeo.ecm.core.api.filename.FilenameService
The default implementation is org.nuxeo.ecm.core.filename.FilenameServiceImpl

extension.documentation: Listener calling the FilenameService when document events occur that would impact the filename, tile or name.
